description.EN:
What's Inside?

  • xvm  Aslains config tweaked
  • custom site
  • deadtanks of white & tracks
  • zoom in 30 max & zoom out 500
  • custom damage panel and log
  • eff counter
  • custom radial menu = z
  • mini map pop up = x
  • crew skill informer = backspace
  • custom 6th sense sound
  • focus fire mod activate = ctrl + v = on/off
  • Arty splash Bloom b = on/off
  • Instant join and quit battle =alt = f1 = on/off
  • 15 meter camo checker = f9 = on/off
  • Quick repair  two options = t or ctrl + mouse click = on/off
  • Wg Replay
  • custom garage
  • last shot viewer
  • Auto clan spam 5 min into match = b +n = on/off
  • two easter egg sounds
  • TessuMod ts3 bridge
  • friendfinder and notifier
  • Minion crew
  • Grid coords on map

 

More can be seen here: Wot Forums

Stay Informed: The Pit Stop

 

  1. Go to C:\Games\World_of_Tanks or C:\Games\World_of_Tanks_Na .
  2. Delete res_mods and mods folder REPEAT Only Res_mods and mods folder.
  3. Open Bcore zip then open bcore folder drag the res_mods and mods folder from my zip to your world of tanks install location as above.
  4. If you happen to show blank info on sights or damage log look in the extra folder for fonts to install.
